subject: RE: [junit] Classloader problems
msgSnippet: ... Not that I know of, but only Kent Beck, Erich Gamma will probably decide that. See http://users.rcn.com/scottstirling/2003/09/10.html#a72 if interested in
messageBody:
> From: Stewart Gebbie [mailto:stewartg@...]
>
> After reading about related bugs I realise that the general
> issue with the classloader had already been discussed. I
> would like to know if there is active development with respect
> to this issue and if it is likely to make it into a pending
> release?

Not that I know of, but only Kent Beck, Erich Gamma will probably decide that.

See http://users.rcn.com/scottstirling/2003/09/10.html#a72 if interested in my griping about JUnit as an open source project.

Scott S.
